column3: ej,randl101,P,bremn901,Fighting after knockdown pitch $Randle ejected by HP umpire Bremigan for fighting; Randle thought he had been dusted so he yelled at pitcher; catcher Newman took offense and tackled Randle; both benches cleared; Randle ejected and Norris was held down by teammate Dave who sat on himFILENAME_TX"
